bug.author: ericl
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Travis tests often time out if any of the "enormous" test suites get retried, for example, test_supported_spaces. These test suites should be split into smaller test rules to avoid timeouts cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sven1977>@sven1977</denchmark-link> .
